Title: Ghosts
Plot: Raylan has a last, lethal showdown with the Detroit mob, while Boyd and Ava try to keep an incriminating secret dead and buried.
GuestStars: Jere Burns, Sam Anderson, Rick Gomez, John Kapelos, Mike O'Malley, Max Perlich, Lindsay Pulsipher, Troy Ruptash, William Gregory Lee, Jesse Luken, Natalie Zea
